biocontainers.name: graphprot
biocontainers.summary: GraphProt is a tool for modelling binding preferences of RNA-binding proteins from high-throughput experiments such as CLIP-seq and RNAcompete.

biotools.summary: GraphProt can be used for modeling binding preferences of RNA-binding proteins from high-throughput experiments such as CLIP-seq and RNAcompete.

bioschemas.name: GraphProt
bioschemas.summary: GraphProt can be used for modeling binding preferences of RNA-binding proteins from high-throughput experiments such as CLIP-seq and RNAcompete.
